comments.creator: chung808@gmail.com
comments.raw_text:
i didnt know about the members page until Al pointed it out to me.   I think having a place where users can find and search on what members are part of the QMO community is a good feature to have.   

My preference is this lives on the start page someplace, but should be quietly placed yet easy enough to find.   This could also live in child pages like under Teams or Forums, but someplace where users can click.   Maybe if it lives under "About?"  

Repro:
1) goto QMO landing page, and verify there's no way to get to the members page
2) visit child pages like Teams, Formus, etc.. and also notice there's no link to members pages.

Expected:
- Have a visible way to get to Members pages.
comments.author: chung808@gmail.com
